Name: El Diablo Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.
Review: The tequila, rich red berry fruit, lime and ginger aren't exactly a subtle combination but it is one that has proved both popular and enduring.
History: The El Diablo started life as a mere "Diablo" in the "Tropical Specialties" section of Hyman Gale & Gerald F. Marco's 1940 book The How and When .
Nutrition: One serving of El Diablo Cocktail contains 178 calories
